Uses of Interface
io.permazen.PermazenObject

Packages that use PermazenObject
Package
Description
io.permazen
Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
io.permazen.change
Classes passed to @OnChange-annotated methods.
io.permazen.spring
Spring Framework integration classes.

  • Uses of PermazenObject in io.permazen

    Classes in io.permazen that implement PermazenObject
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    UntypedPermazenObject
    Represents a PermazenObject whose type does not exist in the transaction's schema.

    Method
    Description

    T
    PermazenTransaction.get(T pobj)
    Get the Java model object with the same object ID as the given PermazenObject and whose state derives from this transaction.
    Methods in io.permazen that return PermazenObject
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default PermazenObject
    PermazenObject.copyIn(String... cascades)
    Copy this instance, and other instances reachable through the specified reference cascades (if any), into the transaction associated with the current thread.
    default PermazenObject
    PermazenObject.copyOut(String... cascades)
    Copy this instance, and other instances reachable through the specified reference cascades (if any), into the in-memory, detached transaction associated with this instance's transaction.
    default PermazenObject
    PermazenObject.copyTo(PermazenTransaction dest, int recursionLimit, CopyState copyState, String... cascades)
    Copy this instance, and other instances it references through the specified reference cascades, into the specified destination transaction.
    PermazenObject
    PermazenTransaction.get(ObjId id)
    Get the Java model object that is associated with this transaction and has the given ID.
    PermazenObject
    ValidationException.getObject()
    Get the object that failed to validate.
